name: Splendid Square: Journey to a EPIC boss battle
name_original: Splendid Square: Journey to a EPIC boss battle
description:
A EPIC journey of a splendid square to become a EPIC square by fighting a boss in SUPER DRAMATIC BOSS BATTLE .......

Level 1 : you go through a mysterious outskirt to reach the underground by fighting blue weirdos and pink un-killable but avoidable jack-o-balls

Level 2: you have to go through UNDERGROUND with red squiggly thing all around and white weirdos with red eyes and they are faster then blue weirdos and pink jack-o-balls are now WHITE!

Level 3: finally you face of the boss "BILL FEDOR" in super dramatic boss battle!!

after defeating the boss you learn a valuable lesson (for the lesson you have to play the game ; ) then the credit rolls ... THE END,

This is my first ever game, The project was too ambitious for first ever game to make but i did it somehow. I am proud of how it turned out
